text: The flag of Pezós () It is a rectangular band with three horizontal bands of the same thickness. The upper and lower ones are made of hazelnut pink and the other half white. Above these three bands stands out a wide circle of vine leaves of similar sizes, divided into two symmetrical groups, longitudinally shaped but in an inverted order, of four green leaves; In each group, the duas have black ribs and the remaining duas have it. The ratio of the flag is 2:4. ==References== Pezos
title: Flag of Pezós
